Posts.EditableText: Yes you'll get an error when you try and look at a review at the moment. I had to take the script down as the site was being spammed. I need to clear out the detritus from the reviews and then come up with a more secure review system. Hopefully this will be done soon but I basically have zero free time at the moment so it may be broken for a while.
